title: Sparkling Swimming Pool, Large Walk-in Closets, 9-Foot Ceilings
posting_body: ['Arbor Place', '5832 Stewart Parkway, Douglasville, GA, 30135', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 60', 'OR Text', '60', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'CONTEMPORARY SOUTHERN LIVING', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1205 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Arbor Place, where friendly small-town atmosphere meets with big-town accessible entertainment.', 'Located just west of Atlanta in Douglasville, Georgia, Arbor Place Apartments was designed for casual contemporary living.', 'With an incredible suite of amenities and features, each of our one-, two- and three-bedroom floor plans come with stylish interiors and resort-style amenities are right outside your door.', 'Nothing beats next-level living at Arbor Place, so schedule your personal tour of your new home today!', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets:70', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $20', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Deposit Max $87.5', 'Pet Policy Fee Max: $400', 'Arbor Place is a pet-friendly apartment community and provides a wonderful place for you and your pet to live.', 'We understand why you would to have a lovable companion and the benefits they provide to our well-being.', 'Arbor Place believes that pet-friendly apartments are an important part of life, which is why we have policies to accommodate pet ownership.', 'Please contact our office for details and applicable fees and deposits.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'LZ0gdl2H']
